name: Asteroid Collision
description:
You as the player control the spaceship with the WASD keys and aim at the incoming asteroids with the mouse.  To fire at the asteroids, you must press the spacebar.  To use rapid fire, press the X button.

If you are hit by an asteroid, your ship will be destroyed.... game is over!

Be careful of the small asteroids, because they will destroy your spaceship too!
